summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Classroom Interface application. All major features working correctly including dashboard, admin mode, course CRUD operations, and file upload functionality.

design_issues.issue: Unlock icon visibility could be improved after admin mode activation

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
Get courses endpoint returns proper data structure
Create course endpoint works with all fields
Update course endpoint handles partial updates
Delete course endpoint removes courses properly
File upload and Base64 storage works correctly
Dashboard loads and displays course cards
Admin modal opens and accepts access code 'PV'
Wrong access code shows appropriate error message
Admin mode enables Create Card functionality
Create Card modal allows course creation
Edit Card modal allows title/image updates
Course Detail view opens and displays content
Content description editing works in admin mode
File upload area accepts and processes files
File download functionality works
File removal functionality works
Viewer mode properly restricts editing capabilities
Admin logout functionality works correctly
Navigation between dashboard and course detail works

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor UI visibility issue)
